name: tentree Golden Spruce Crop T-Shirt - Women's
description:
Light, soft and cropped, this tee pairs nicely with high-waisted jeans.Soft Treeblend fabric is made of recycled and natural fibres, giving you a clean conscience.tentree’s goal is to construct quality apparel and ensure that ten trees are planted for every article of clothing sold.Regular fit feels just right.
